remarks: Lemma for ~ itgaddnc ; cf. ~ itgaddlem1 .  (Contributed by Brendan Leahy, 7-Nov-2017.)
statement:
ibladdnc.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
ibladdnc.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 ) $.
ibladdnc.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. V ) $.
ibladdnc.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. L^1 ) $.
ibladdnc.m $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( B + C ) ) e. MblFn ) $.
itgaddnclem.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
itgaddnclem.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. RR ) $.
itgaddnclem.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> 0 <_ B ) $.
itgaddnclem.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> 0 <_ C ) $.
itgaddnclem1 $p |- ( ph -> S. A ( B + C ) _d x = ( S. A B _d x + S. A C _d x ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
